issue.title: [C++] Reduce code size of vector_sort.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10851](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10851). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Code is generated for many types with a same physical representation, such as temporals.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10851?focusedCommentId=17246707) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8877
